channel.title: [PI] makeGlobalObject
channel.description:
Hello,
I need some help with adding objects, I have found the place in which they are put - global-objects.cfg. However, I can't get it to work. Please could someone give me an example: // objectId X Y H Face objectType //object = 9981 3254 3429 0 -1 10
I have also tried without the // so it can't be that..
Thanks.
